title: how to boot full xp from usb flash ?

forumNotes.author: anteelsayed
forumNotes.content:
I want to run a full xp "as complete as possible" from usb stick ,and i want to know if it's possible to run it on any pc .  
thanks an advance for your time

forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
Universal HDD Image files for XP and Windows 7  
<http://reboot.pro/9830/>  

BOOT_USB - Make Bootable USB-Drives  
Booting with Grub4dos Menu and using Boot Image files  
[http://www.911cd.net...showtopic=24424](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=24424 "External link")
